desc: Iberian Pastures Iberico Pork is an extraordinary new American venture featuring Spain’s renowned Iberico Hogs being raised in the United States in southern Georgia. On a mission to reclaim Spain Heritage Foods in the US.

layout.text: AMERICAN IBERICO PORK - PEANUT & PECAN FED
INSPIRED IN SPAIN, MADE IN AMERICA, 100% PASTURE RAISED
